videoData.title: What it's really like to be colorblind
videoData.socialTitle: What it's really like to be colorblind

nodes.whoTheyAre: Bryan Kett is an award-winning writer, storyteller and former high school science teacher.

videoData.description: Who's to say an apple is red or that grass is green? Humorist and former science teacher Bryan Kett describes life with colorblindness, explaining that it's not just him -- everyone's experience of color is subjective. Follow Kett as he explores the scientific, philosophical and social dimensions of living life on a certain color scale.
videoData.socialDescription: Who's to say an apple is red or that grass is green? Humorist and former science teacher Bryan Kett describes life with colorblindness, explaining that it's not just him -- everyone's experience of color is subjective. Follow Kett as he explores the scientific, philosophical and social dimensions of living life on a certain color scale.
